name: C4 CPU
short_description:
C4 CPU -CPU & Ram Meter is a small application which   provides useful information about your computer's processor and memory usage, allowing you to optimally utilize your PC resources and your PC performance and your hard drive usage and More.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

[You Must Install .Net Framework with C4 CPU]

DOWNLOAD NOW --> http://www.microsoft.com/net
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

New update 1.2

Fixed News bar online

Fixed about now ( online )

Fixed “UPDATE” button for v1.0v

Fixed some crashes

Added new label “Download The Latest Update For C4 CPU”

Added Server Status

Added Text font now bigger

Added ” CPU USAGE” CPU USAGE Core 2 ” RAM USAGE.

Thank you
summary: C4 CPU CPU & Ram Meter provides useful information about your computer
